scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Virgin Mary holding the Christ Child, surrounded by a radiant halo. Below them, a group of figures, many crowned and holding staffs, are arranged in a tree-like structure. In the foreground, a man reclines, resting his head on his hand. The background is dark with scattered stars, suggesting a celestial or dreamlike setting. The overall composition evokes a sense of divine presence and earthly contemplation.
